desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

This file is keyed on CATEGORY. YYYYMMDD. COMPANY.THREAD holds the list of categ ids If there is a split then the id will be CATEGORY.YYYYMMDD.COMPANY.THREAD;SPLITNO. The main record will show the number of splits at the 1st position the main record in this file will contain the oldest list of ids and the highest split will hold the latest list of ids.
